original: Majjhima Nikāya 70
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Kīṭāgirisutta
analyzed: kīṭāgirisutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kāsīsu cārikaṁ carati mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā kāsīsu cārikam carati mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhi

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “ahaṁ kho, bhikkhave, aññatreva rattibhojanā bhuñjāmi.
analyzed: aham kho bhikkhave aññatra iva ratti bhojanā bhuñjāmi

original: Aññatra kho panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, rattibhojanā bhuñjamāno appābādhatañca sañjānāmi appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca balañca phāsuvihārañca.
analyzed: aññatra kho pana aha bhikkhave ratti bhojanā bhuñjamānaḥ appa ābādha tañca sañjānāmi appa ātaṅka tañca lahu ṭṭhānañca balañca phāsu vihārañca

original: Etha, tumhepi, bhikkhave, aññatreva rattibhojanā bhuñjatha.
analyzed: tumhe pi bhikkhave aññatra iva ratti bhojanā bhuñjatha

original: Aññatra kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhepi rattibhojanā bhuñjamānā appābādhatañca sañjānissatha appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca balañca phāsuvihārañcā”ti.
analyzed: aññatra kho pana bhikkhave tumhe api ratti bhojanā bhuñjamānāḥ appa ābādha tañca sañjānissatha appa ātaṅka tañca lahu ṭṭhānañca balañca phāsu vihārañca ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato

original: Atha kho bhagavā kāsīsu anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena kīṭāgiri nāma kāsīnaṁ nigamo tadavasari.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā kāsīsu anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena kīṭāgiri nāma kāsīnam nigamaḥ tat avasari

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā kīṭāgirismiṁ viharati kāsīnaṁ nigame.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavā kīṭāgirismin viharati kāsīnam nigame

original: Tena kho pana samayena assajipunabbasukā nāma bhikkhū kīṭāgirismiṁ āvāsikā honti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena assajipunabbasukāḥ nāma bhikkhū kīṭāgirismim āvāsikāḥ honti

original: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ bhikkhū yena assajipu nabbasukāḥ bhikkhū tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā assajipu nabbasuke bhikkhū etat avocuḥ

original: “bhagavā kho, āvuso, aññatreva rattibhojanā bhuñjati bhikkhusaṅgho ca.
analyzed: bhagavā kho āvuso aññatra iva rattibhojanā bhuñjati bhikkhu saṅghaḥ ca

original: Aññatra kho panāvuso, rattibhojanā bhuñjamānā appābādhatañca sañjānanti appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca balañca phāsuvihārañca.
analyzed: aññatra kho pana āvuso ratti bhojanā bhuñjamānāḥ appa ābādha tañca sañjānanti appa ātaṅka tañca lahu ṭṭhānañca balañca phāsu vihārañca

original: Etha, tumhepi, āvuso, aññatreva rattibhojanā bhuñjatha.
analyzed: tumhe pi āvuso aññatra iva ratti bhojanā bhuñjatha

original: Aññatra kho panāvuso, tumhepi rattibhojanā bhuñjamānā appābādhatañca sañjānissatha appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca balañca phāsuvihārañcā”ti.
analyzed: aññatra kho pana āvuso tumhe pi ratti bhojanā bhuñjamānāḥ appa ābādha tañca sañjānissatha appa ātaṅka tañca lahu ṭṭhānañca balañca phāsu vihārañca ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū te bhikkhū etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte assajipu nabbasukāḥ bhikkhū te bhikkhū etat avocuḥ

original: “mayaṁ kho, āvuso, sāyañceva bhuñjāma pāto ca divā ca vikāle.
analyzed: mayam khalu āvuso sāyam ca iva bhuñjāma ca divā ca vikāle

original: Te mayaṁ sāyañceva bhuñjamānā pāto ca divā ca vikāle appābādhatañca sañjānāma appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca balañca phāsuvihārañca.
analyzed: te mayam sāyam ca iva bhuñjamānā ca divā ca vikāle appa ābādha tañca sañjānāma appa ātaṅka tañca lahu ṭṭhānañca balañca phāsu vihārañca

original: Te mayaṁ kiṁ sandiṭṭhikaṁ hitvā kālikaṁ anudhāvissāma?
analyzed: te mayam kim sandiṭṭhikam hitvā kālikam anudhāvissāma

original: Sāyañceva mayaṁ bhuñjissāma pāto ca divā ca vikāle”ti.
analyzed: sāyam ca iva mayam bhuñjissāma pāto ca divā ca vikāla iti

original: Yato kho te bhikkhū nāsakkhiṁsu assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū saññāpetuṁ, atha yena bhagavā
analyzed: yatas kho te bhikkhū na asakkhisu assaji punabbasuke bhikkhū saññāpetu atha yena bhagavā

original: tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ
analyzed: tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamanta

original: nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “idha mayaṁ, bhante, yena assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamimha; upasaṅkamitvā assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū etadavocumha:
analyzed: idha maya bhante yena assajipu nabbasukā bhikkhū tena upasaṅkamimha upasaṅkamitvā assajipu nabbasuke bhikkhū etat avocumha

original: ‘bhagavā kho, āvuso, aññatreva rattibhojanā bhuñjati bhikkhusaṅgho ca;
analyzed: bhagavā kho āvuso aññatra iva rattibhojanā bhuñjati bhikkhu saṅghaḥ ca

original: aññatra kho panāvuso, rattibhojanā bhuñjamānā appābādhatañca sañjānanti appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca balañca phāsuvihārañca.
analyzed: aññatra kho pana āvuso ratti bhojanā bhuñjamānāḥ appa ābādha tañca sañjānanti appa ātaṅka tañca lahu ṭṭhānañca balañca phāsu vihārañca

original: Etha, tumhepi, āvuso, aññatreva rattibhojanā bhuñjatha.
analyzed: tumhe pi āvuso aññatra iva ratti bhojanā bhuñjatha

original: Aññatra kho panāvuso, tumhepi rattibhojanā bhuñjamānā appābādhatañca sañjānissatha appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca balañca phāsuvihārañcā’ti.
analyzed: aññatra kho pana āvuso tumhe pi ratti bhojanā bhuñjamānāḥ appa ābādha tañca sañjānissatha appa ātaṅka tañca lahu ṭṭhānañca balañca phāsu vihārañca ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū amhe etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte bhante assajipu nabbasukāḥ bhikkhū amhe etat avocuḥ

original: ‘mayaṁ kho, āvuso, sāyañceva bhuñjāma pāto ca divā ca vikāle.
analyzed: mayam khalu āvuso sāyam ca iva bhuñjāma ca divā ca vikāle

original: Te mayaṁ sāyañceva bhuñjamānā pāto ca divā ca vikāle appābādhatañca sañjānāma appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca balañca phāsuvihārañca.
analyzed: te mayam sāyam ca iva bhuñjamānā ca divā ca vikāle appa ābādha tañca sañjānāma appa ātaṅka tañca lahu ṭṭhānañca balañca phāsu vihārañca

original: Te mayaṁ kiṁ sandiṭṭhikaṁ hitvā kālikaṁ anudhāvissāma?
analyzed: te mayam kim sandiṭṭhikam hitvā kālikam anudhāvissāma

original: Sāyañceva mayaṁ bhuñjissāma pāto ca divā ca vikāle’ti.
analyzed: sāyam ca iva mayam bhuñjissāma pāto ca divā ca vikāla iti

original: Yato kho mayaṁ, bhante, nāsakkhimha assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū saññāpetuṁ, atha mayaṁ etamatthaṁ bhagavato ārocemā”ti.
analyzed: yatas kho maya bhante na asakkhimha assaji punabbasuke bhikkhū saññāpetu atha mayam etam attham bhagavataḥ ārocema iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā aññataram bhikkhum āmantesi

original: “ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū āmantehi:
analyzed: ehi tva bhikkhu mama vacanena assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū āmantehi

original: ‘satthā āyasmante āmantetī’”ti.
analyzed: satthā āyasmante āmantā iti iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yena assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū etadavoca:
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā yena assajipu nabbasukāḥ bhikkhū tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā assajipu nabbasuke bhikkhū etat avoca

original: “satthā āyasmante āmantetī”ti.
analyzed: satthā āyasmante āmantā iti iti

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho assajipu nabbasukā bhikkhū tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā

original: tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ
analyzed: tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamanta

original: nisinne kho assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: nisinne kho assajipu nabbasuke bhikkhū bhagavā etat avoca

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, sambahulā bhikkhū tumhe upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave sambahulāḥ bhikkhū tumhe upasaṅkamitvā etat avocuḥ

original: ‘bhagavā kho, āvuso, aññatreva rattibhojanā bhuñjati bhikkhusaṅgho ca.
analyzed: bhagavā kho āvuso aññatra iva rattibhojanā bhuñjati bhikkhu saṅghaḥ ca

original: Aññatra kho panāvuso, rattibhojanā bhuñjamānā appābādhatañca sañjānanti appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca balañca phāsuvihārañca.
analyzed: aññatra kho pana āvuso ratti bhojanā bhuñjamānāḥ appa ābādha tañca sañjānanti appa ātaṅka tañca lahu ṭṭhānañca balañca phāsu vihārañca

original: Etha, tumhepi, āvuso, aññatreva rattibhojanā bhuñjatha.
analyzed: tumhe pi āvuso aññatra iva ratti bhojanā bhuñjatha

original: Aññatra kho panāvuso, tumhepi rattibhojanā bhuñjamānā appābādhatañca sañjānissatha appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca balañca phāsuvihārañcā’ti.
analyzed: aññatra kho pana āvuso tumhe pi ratti bhojanā bhuñjamānāḥ appa ābādha tañca sañjānissatha appa ātaṅka tañca lahu ṭṭhānañca balañca phāsu vihārañca ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, kira, bhikkhave, tumhe te bhikkhū evaṁ avacuttha:
analyzed: evam vutte kira bhikkhave tumhe te bhikkhū evam avacuttha

original: ‘mayaṁ kho panāvuso, sāyañceva bhuñjāma pāto ca divā ca vikāle.
analyzed: mayam khalu pana āvuso sāyañca iva bhuñjāma ca divā ca vikāle

original: Te mayaṁ sāyañceva bhuñjamānā pāto ca divā ca vikāle appābādhatañca sañjānāma appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca balañca phāsuvihārañca.
analyzed: te mayam sāyam ca iva bhuñjamānā ca divā ca vikāle appa ābādha tañca sañjānāma appa ātaṅka tañca lahu ṭṭhānañca balañca phāsu vihārañca

original: Te mayaṁ kiṁ sandiṭṭhikaṁ hitvā kālikaṁ anudhāvissāma?
analyzed: te mayam kim sandiṭṭhikam hitvā kālikam anudhāvissāma

original: Sāyañceva mayaṁ bhuñjissāma pāto ca divā ca vikāle’”ti.
analyzed: sāyam ca iva mayam bhuñjissāma pāto ca divā ca vikāla iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: “Kiṁ nu me tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānātha yaṁ kiñcāyaṁ purisapuggalo
analyzed: kim nu me tumhe bhikkhave evam dhammam desitam ājānātha yam kiñca ayam purisa puggalo

original: paṭisaṁvedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tassa akusalā dhammā parihāyanti
analyzed: paṭisavedeti sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā tassa akusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti

original: kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī”ti?
analyzed: kusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti iti

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Nanu me tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānātha idhekaccassa yaṁ evarūpaṁ
analyzed: nanu me tumhe bhikkhave evam dhammam desitam ājānātha idha ekaccassa yam evarūpa

original: sukhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, idha
analyzed: sukham vedanam vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti idha

original: panekaccassa evarūpaṁ sukhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā
analyzed: pana ekaccassa evarūpam sukham vedanam vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti kusalāḥ

original: dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, idhekaccassa evarūpaṁ dukkhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayato akusalā dhammā
analyzed: dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti idha ekaccassa evarūpam dukkham vedanam vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ

original: abhivaḍḍhanti kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, idha panekaccassa evarūpaṁ dukkhaṁ vedanaṁ
analyzed: abhivaḍḍhanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti idha pana ekaccassa evarūpam dukkham

original: vedayato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, idhekaccassa evarūpaṁ
analyzed: vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti idha ekaccassa evarūpa

original: adukkhamasukhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti kusalā dhammā parihāyanti,
analyzed: adukkham asukham vedanam vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti

original: idha panekaccassa evarūpaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti
analyzed: idha pana ekaccassa evarūpam adukkham asukham vedanam vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti

original: kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī”ti?
analyzed: kusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: “Sādhu, bhikkhave.
analyzed: sādhu bhikkhave

original: Mayā cetaṁ, bhikkhave, aññātaṁ abhavissa adiṭṭhaṁ aviditaṁ asacchikataṁ aphassitaṁ paññāya:
analyzed: mayā ceta bhikkhave aññātam abhavissa a diṭṭham a viditam a sacchikatam a phassitam paññāya

original: ‘idhekaccassa evarūpaṁ sukhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti kusalā dhammā parihāyantī’ti,
analyzed: idha ekaccassa evarūpam sukham vedanam vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti iti

original: evāhaṁ ajānanto ‘evarūpaṁ sukhaṁ vedanaṁ pajahathā’ti vadeyyaṁ; api nu me etaṁ, bhikkhave, patirūpaṁ abhavissā”ti?
analyzed: eva aham a jānantaḥ evarūpam sukham vedanam pajahatha ati vadeyya api nu me eta bhikkhave patirūpam abhavissa ati

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Yasmā ca kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, mayā ñātaṁ diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāya:
analyzed: yasmā ca kho eta bhikkhave mayā ñātam diṭṭham viditam sacchikatam phassitam paññāya

original: ‘idhekaccassa evarūpaṁ sukhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti kusalā dhammā parihāyantī’ti, tasmāhaṁ ‘evarūpaṁ sukhaṁ vedanaṁ pajahathā’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: idha ekaccassa evarūpam sukham vedanam vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti iti tasmā aham evarūpam sukham vedanam pajahatha ati vadāmi

original: Mayā cetaṁ, bhikkhave, aññātaṁ abhavissa adiṭṭhaṁ aviditaṁ asacchikataṁ aphassitaṁ paññāya:
analyzed: mayā ceta bhikkhave aññātam abhavissa a diṭṭham a viditam a sacchikatam a phassitam paññāya

original: ‘idhekaccassa evarūpaṁ sukhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti kusalā
analyzed: idha ekaccassa evarūpam sukham vedanam vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti kusalāḥ

original: dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī’ti, evāhaṁ ajānanto ‘evarūpaṁ sukhaṁ vedanaṁ upasampajja viharathā’ti vadeyyaṁ;
analyzed: dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti iti eva aham a jānantaḥ evarūpam sukham vedanam upasampajja viharatha ati vadeyya

original: api nu me etaṁ, bhikkhave, patirūpaṁ abhavissā”ti?
analyzed: api nu me eta bhikkhave patirūpam abhavissa ati

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Yasmā ca kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, mayā ñātaṁ diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāya:
analyzed: yasmā ca kho eta bhikkhave mayā ñātam diṭṭham viditam sacchikatam phassitam paññāya

original: ‘idhekaccassa evarūpaṁ sukhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī’ti, tasmāhaṁ ‘evarūpaṁ sukhaṁ vedanaṁ upasampajja viharathā’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: idha ekaccassa evarūpam sukham vedanam vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti iti tasmā aham evarūpam sukham vedanam upasampajja viharatha ati vadāmi

original: Mayā cetaṁ, bhikkhave, aññātaṁ abhavissa adiṭṭhaṁ aviditaṁ asacchikataṁ aphassitaṁ paññāya:
analyzed: mayā ceta bhikkhave aññātam abhavissa a diṭṭham a viditam a sacchikatam a phassitam paññāya

original: ‘idhekaccassa evarūpaṁ dukkhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti kusalā dhammā parihāyantī’ti, evāhaṁ ajānanto ‘evarūpaṁ dukkhaṁ vedanaṁ pajahathā’ti vadeyyaṁ;
analyzed: idha ekaccassa evarūpam dukkham vedanam vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti iti eva aham a jānantaḥ evarūpam dukkham vedanam pajahatha ati vadeyya

original: api nu me etaṁ, bhikkhave, patirūpaṁ abhavissā”ti?
analyzed: api nu me eta bhikkhave patirūpam abhavissa ati

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Yasmā ca kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, mayā ñātaṁ diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāya:
analyzed: yasmā ca kho eta bhikkhave mayā ñātam diṭṭham viditam sacchikatam phassitam paññāya

original: ‘idhekaccassa evarūpaṁ dukkhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti kusalā dhammā parihāyantī’ti, tasmāhaṁ ‘evarūpaṁ dukkhaṁ vedanaṁ pajahathā’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: idha ekaccassa evarūpam dukkham vedanam vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti iti tasmā aham evarūpam dukkham vedanam pajahatha ati vadāmi

original: Mayā cetaṁ, bhikkhave, aññātaṁ abhavissa adiṭṭhaṁ aviditaṁ asacchikataṁ aphassitaṁ paññāya:
analyzed: mayā ceta bhikkhave aññātam abhavissa a diṭṭham a viditam a sacchikatam a phassitam paññāya

original: ‘idhekaccassa evarūpaṁ dukkhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti kusalā
analyzed: idha ekaccassa evarūpam dukkham vedanam vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti kusalā

original: dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī’ti, evāhaṁ ajānanto ‘evarūpaṁ dukkhaṁ vedanaṁ upasampajja viharathā’ti vadeyyaṁ;
analyzed: dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti iti eva aham a jānantaḥ evarūpam dukkham vedanam upasampajja viharatha ati vadeyya

original: api nu me etaṁ, bhikkhave, patirūpaṁ abhavissā”ti?
analyzed: api nu me eta bhikkhave patirūpam abhavissa ati

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

analyzed: kusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti iti eva aham a jānantaḥ evarūpam adukkham asukham

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Yasmā ca kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, mayā ñātaṁ diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāya:

original: ‘idhekaccassa evarūpaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti
analyzed: idha ekaccassa evarūpam adukkham asukham vedanam vedayataḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti

original: kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī’ti, tasmāhaṁ ‘evarūpaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ vedanaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: kusalāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti iti tasmā aham evarūpam adukkham asukham vedanam upasampajja

original: viharathā’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: viharatha ati vadāmi

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, sabbesaṁyeva bhikkhūnaṁ ‘appamādena karaṇīyan’ti vadāmi;
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave sabbesayā iva bhikkhūnam appamādena karaṇīyanti vadāmi

original: na panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, sabbesaṁyeva bhikkhūnaṁ ‘na appamādena karaṇīyan’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: na pana āha bhikkhave sabbesayā iva bhikkhūnam na appamādena karaṇīyanti vadāmi

original: Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū arahanto khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā
analyzed: ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū arahantaḥ khīṇa āsavāḥ vusitavantaḥ kata karaṇīyāḥ ohita bhārāḥ

original: anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanā sammadaññāvimuttā, tathārūpānāhaṁ, bhikkhave,
analyzed: an uppatta sadatthā parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanā sammadaññā vimuttā tathārūpān āha bhikkhave

original: bhikkhūnaṁ ‘na appamādena karaṇīyan’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: bhikkhūnam na appamādena karaṇīyanti vadāmi

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Kataṁ tesaṁ appamādena.
analyzed: katam tesam appamādena

original: Abhabbā te pamajjituṁ.
analyzed: abhabbā te pamajjitu

original: Ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sekkhā appattamānasā anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ patthayamānā viharanti, tathārūpānāhaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ ‘appamādena karaṇīyan’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: ye ca kho te bhikkhave bhikkhū sekkhāḥ appatta mānasāḥ anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamānāḥ viharanti tathārūpān āha bhikkhave bhikkhūnam appamādena karaṇīyanti vadāmi

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Appeva nāmime āyasmanto anulomikāni senāsanāni paṭisevamānā kalyāṇamitte bhajamānā indriyāni samannānayamānā—
analyzed: appa iva nāma ime āyasmantaḥ anulomikāni senāsanāni paṭisevamānā kalyāṇa mitte bhajamānā indriyāni samannānayamānā

original: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyunti.
analyzed: yassa atthāya kula puttā sammad eva agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajanti tad anuttara brahmacariya pariyosānam diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyuṃ ti

original: Imaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ appamādaphalaṁ sampassamāno ‘appamādena karaṇīyan’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: imam kho aha bhikkhave imesam bhikkhūnam appamāda phalam sampassamānaḥ appamādena karaṇīyanti vadāmi

original: Sattime, bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
analyzed: sattime bhikkhave puggalā santaḥ savijjamānāḥ lokasmi

original: Katame satta?
analyzed: katame satta

original: Ubhatobhāgavimutto, paññāvimutto, kāyasakkhi, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto, dhammānusārī, saddhānusārī.
analyzed: ubhatobhāga vimutto paññā vimutto kāya sakkhi diṭṭhi ppatto saddhā vimutto dhamma anusārī saddhā anusārī

original: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo ubhatobhāgavimutto?
analyzed: katamaḥ ca bhikkhave puggalaḥ ubhatobhāga vimutto

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te kāyena phusitvā viharati paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te kāyena phusitvā viharati paññāya ca ssa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo ubhatobhāgavimutto
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave puggalaḥ ubhatobhāga vimuttaḥ

original: imassa kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘na appamādena karaṇīyan’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: imassa kho aha bhikkhave bhikkhuno na appamādena karaṇīyanti vadāmi

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Kataṁ tassa appamādena.
analyzed: katam tassa appamādena

original: Abhabbo so pamajjituṁ.
analyzed: abhabbaḥ saḥ pamajjitu

original: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo paññāvimutto?
analyzed: katamaḥ ca bhikkhave puggalo paññā vimutto

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te na kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te na kāyena phusitvā viharati paññāya ca ssa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo paññāvimutto.
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave puggalo paññā vimutto

original: Imassapi kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘na appamādena karaṇīyan’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: imassa api kho aha bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ na appamādena karaṇīyanti vadāmi

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Kataṁ tassa appamādena.
analyzed: katam tassa appamādena

original: Abhabbo so pamajjituṁ.
analyzed: abhabbaḥ saḥ pamajjitu

original: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo kāyasakkhi?
analyzed: katamaḥ ca bhikkhave puggalo kāya sakkhi

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te kāyena phusitvā viharati paññāya ca ssa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti

analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave puggalo kāya sakkhi

analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo saddhānusārī?
analyzed: katamaḥ ca bhikkhave puggalo saddhā anusārī

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te na
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te na

original: kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti, tathāgate
analyzed: kāyena phusitvā viharati paññāya ca ssa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇāḥ honti tathāgate

original: cassa saddhāmattaṁ hoti pemamattaṁ, api cassa ime dhammā honti, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: cassa saddhā mattam hoti api cassa ime dhammā honti

original: saddhindriyaṁ, vīriyindriyaṁ, satindriyaṁ, samādhindriyaṁ, paññindriyaṁ.
analyzed: saddhindriya vīriyindriya satindriya samādhindriya paññindriya

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo saddhānusārī.
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave puggalaḥ saddhā anusārī

original: Imassapi kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘appamādena karaṇīyan’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: imassa api kho aha bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ appamādena karaṇīyanti vadāmi

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Appeva nāma ayamāyasmā anulomikāni senāsanāni paṭisevamāno kalyāṇamitte bhajamāno indriyāni samannānayamāno—
analyzed: appā iva nāma ayam āyasmai anulomikāni senāsanāni paṭisevamāno kalyāṇa mitte bhajamāno indriyāni samannānayamāno

original: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyāti.
analyzed: yassa atthāya kula puttā sammad eva agārasma anagāriyam pabbajanti tad anuttara brahmacariya pariyosānam diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyya ati

original: Imaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno appamādaphalaṁ sampassamāno ‘appamādena karaṇīyan’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: imam kho aha bhikkhave imassa bhikkhuno appamāda phalam sampassamānaḥ appamādena karaṇīyanti vadāmi

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ādikeneva aññārādhanaṁ vadāmi;
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave ādikena iva añña ārādhanam vadāmi

original: api ca, bhikkhave, anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā aññārādhanā hoti.
analyzed: api ca bhikkhave anupubba sikkhā anupubba kiriyā anupubba paṭipadā añña ārādhanā hoti

original: Kathañca, bhikkhave, anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā aññārādhanā hoti?
analyzed: kathañca bhikkhave anupubba sikkhā anupubba kiriyā anupubba paṭipadā añña ārādhanā hoti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, saddhājāto upasaṅkamati, upasaṅkamanto payirupāsati, payirupāsanto
analyzed: idha bhikkhave saddhājātaḥ upasaṅkamati upasaṅkamantaḥ payirupāsati payirupāsantaḥ

original: sotaṁ odahati, ohitasoto dhammaṁ suṇāti, sutvā dhammaṁ dhāreti, dhatānaṁ dhammānaṁ
analyzed: sotam odahati ohita sotaḥ dhammam suṇāti sutvā dhammam dhāreti dhatānam dhammāna

original: atthaṁ upaparikkhati, atthaṁ upaparikkhato dhammā nijjhānaṁ khamanti, dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā
analyzed: attham upaparikkhati attham upaparikkhataḥ dhammāḥ nijjhānam khamanti dhamma nijjhāna kkhantiyā

original: sati chando jāyati, chandajāto ussahati, ussāhetvā tuleti, tulayitvā padahati, pahitatto
analyzed: sati chandaḥ jāyati chanda jātaḥ ussahati ussāhetvā tuleti tulayitvā padahati pahitattaḥ

original: samāno kāyena ceva paramasaccaṁ sacchikaroti, paññāya ca naṁ ativijjha passati.
analyzed: samānaḥ kāyena ca iva paramasaccam sacchikaroti paññāya ca nam ativijjha passati

original: Sāpi nāma, bhikkhave, saddhā nāhosi;
analyzed: sā api nāma bhikkhave saddhā na ahosi

original: tampi nāma, bhikkhave, upasaṅkamanaṁ nāhosi;
analyzed: tat pi nāma bhikkhave upasaṅkamanam na ahosi

original: sāpi nāma, bhikkhave, payirupāsanā nāhosi;
analyzed: sā api nāma bhikkhave payirupāsanā na ahosi

original: tampi nāma, bhikkhave, sotāvadhānaṁ nāhosi;
analyzed: tat pi nāma bhikkhave sotāvadhānam na ahosi

original: tampi nāma, bhikkhave, dhammassavanaṁ nāhosi;
analyzed: tat pi nāma bhikkhave dhammassavanam na ahosi

original: sāpi nāma, bhikkhave, dhammadhāraṇā nāhosi;
analyzed: sā api nāma bhikkhave dhamma dhāraṇā na ahosi

original: sāpi nāma, bhikkhave, atthūpaparikkhā nāhosi;
analyzed: sā api nāma bhikkhave atthūpaparikkhā na ahosi

original: sāpi nāma, bhikkhave, dhammanijjhānakkhanti nāhosi;
analyzed: sā api nāma bhikkhave dhamma nijjhāna kkhanti na ahosi

original: sopi nāma, bhikkhave, chando nāhosi;
analyzed: saḥ api nāma bhikkhave chandaḥ na ahosi

original: sopi nāma, bhikkhave, ussāho nāhosi;
analyzed: saḥ api nāma bhikkhave ussāhaḥ na ahosi

original: sāpi nāma, bhikkhave, tulanā nāhosi;
analyzed: sā api nāma bhikkhave tulanā na ahosi

original: tampi nāma, bhikkhave, padhānaṁ nāhosi.
analyzed: tat pi nāma bhikkhave padhānam na ahosi

original: Vippaṭipannāttha, bhikkhave, micchāpaṭipannāttha, bhikkhave.
analyzed: vippaṭipannā attha bhikkhave micchā paṭipannā attha bhikkhave

original: Kīva dūrevime, bhikkhave, moghapurisā apakkantā imamhā dhammavinayā.
analyzed: kīva dūrevime bhikkhave moghapurisāḥ apakkantāḥ imamhā dhammavinayā

original: Atthi, bhikkhave, catuppadaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ yassuddiṭṭhassa viññū puriso nacirasseva paññāyatthaṁ ājāneyya.
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave catuppadam veyyākaraṇam yassa uddiṭṭhassa viññū purisaḥ nacirassa iva paññāya attham ājāneyya

original: Uddisissāmi vo, bhikkhave, ājānissatha me tan”ti?
analyzed: uddisissāmi vaḥ bhikkhave ājānissatha me tanti

original: “Ke ca mayaṁ, bhante, ke ca dhammassa aññātāro”ti?
analyzed: ke ca maya bhante ke ca dhammassa aññātāro ti

original: “Yopi so, bhikkhave, satthā āmisagaru āmisadāyādo āmisehi saṁsaṭṭho viharati tassa pāyaṁ evarūpī paṇopaṇaviyā na upeti:
analyzed: yaḥ api saḥ bhikkhave satthā āmisa garu āmisa dāyādaḥ āmisehi sasaṭṭhaḥ viharati tassa pāyam evarūpī paṇopaṇaviyā na upeti

original: ‘evañca no assa atha naṁ kareyyāma, na ca no evamassa na naṁ kareyyāmā’ti, kiṁ pana, bhikkhave, yaṁ tathāgato sabbaso āmisehi visaṁsaṭṭho viharati.
analyzed: evam ca no assa atha nam kareyyāma na ca no evam assa na nam kareyyāma ati kim pana bhikkhave yam tathāgataḥ sabbaso āmisehi visasaṭṭhaḥ viharati

original: Saddhassa, bhikkhave, sāvakassa satthusāsane pariyogāhiya vattato ayamanudhammo hoti:
analyzed: saddhassa bhikkhave sāvakassa satthu sāsane vattataḥ ayam anudhammaḥ hoti

original: ‘satthā bhagavā, sāvakohamasmi;
analyzed: satthā bhagavā sāvakaḥ ham asmi

original: jānāti bhagavā, nāhaṁ jānāmī’ti.
analyzed: jānāti bhagavā na aham jānāmi iti

original: Saddhassa, bhikkhave, sāvakassa satthusāsane pariyogāhiya vattato ruḷhanīyaṁ satthusāsanaṁ hoti ojavantaṁ.
analyzed: saddhassa bhikkhave sāvakassa satthu sāsane vattataḥ ruḷhanīyam satthu sāsanam hoti ojavanta

original: Saddhassa, bhikkhave, sāvakassa satthusāsane pariyogāhiya vattato ayamanudhammo hoti:
analyzed: saddhassa bhikkhave sāvakassa satthu sāsane vattataḥ ayam anudhammaḥ hoti

original: ‘kāmaṁ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu, sarīre upassussatu maṁsalohitaṁ, yaṁ
analyzed: kāmam taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu sarīre upassussatu ya

original: taṁ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṁ na taṁ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa
analyzed: tam purisa thāmena purisa vīriyena purisa parakkamena pattabbam na tam apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa

original: saṇṭhānaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: saṇṭhānam bhavissati iti

original: Saddhassa, bhikkhave, sāvakassa satthusāsane pariyogāhiya vattato dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—
analyzed: saddhassa bhikkhave sāvakassa satthu sāsane pariyogāhiya vattataḥ dvinnam phalānam aññataram phalam pāṭikaṅkha

original: diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā”ti.
analyzed: diṭṭhā iva dhamme aññā sati vā upādisese anāgāmi tā ti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Kīṭāgirisuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ dasamaṁ.
analyzed: kīṭāgiri suttam niṭṭhitam dasama

original: Bhikkhuvaggo niṭṭhito dutiyo.
analyzed: bhikkhu vaggaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ dutiyaḥ

original: Tassuddānaṁ
analyzed: tassa uddāna

original: Kuñjara rāhula sassataloko,
analyzed: kuñjara rāhula sassata loko

original: Mālukyaputto ca bhaddāli nāmo;
analyzed: mālukya putto ca bhaddāli nāmo

original: Khudda dijātha sahampatiyācaṁ,
analyzed: khudda sahampatiyāca

original: Nāḷaka raññikiṭāgirināmo.
analyzed: nāḷaka raññi kiṭāgiri nāmo
